alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Montgomery; Moore; Randolph; Stanly (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 7:10PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Moore, southeastern Davidson, northern Montgomery, southern Randolph and northeastern Stanly Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 709 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Badin Lake, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albemarle, Troy, North Carolina Zoo, Badin Lake, Biscoe, Seagrove, Plyler, Badin, Star and Richfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
